channel.title: Books Fear Rock Insane Coding Watership Dad on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Books Fear Rock Insane Coding Watership Dad on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i can't sleep for the life of me. seriously.
item.description: it doesn’t work. having a crazy scedule where you are up from 11 to 6 and sleep from 6 to 9 and then are up from 9 until 6 is insane. it creates ghosts in my head. I was hanging out at work yesterday morning - about 24hrs ago - and I thought I heard voices calling my name. I scurried off home. full of fear of zombies and demons. it ruled.
